Gmail is recommended Get MMS photo Get SMS Refresh photo gallery at opening Refresh MMS gallery Search new MMS in the phone when camera photo gallery opens Gmail instant photo autodownload The feature has been tested with Gmail only. Requires "Data connection" is always on. For usage of Gmail photos autodownload feature please check following: 
1. Gmail IMAP access is enabled 
2. Google specific "Access for less secure apps" is turned on 
3. "Data connection" at your phone is always on Enable if camera sens MMS photo.
